rules_privacy_content_collect_data: Data Collection and Use: No personal data is collected, stored, or shared by the app designers. Location is only shared if and when the user manually triggers sharing during an incident or need for assistance.
rules_privacy_content_share_voluntary: Voluntary Sharing: Location sharing is performed only by the user and only with emergency services or close contacts chosen by the user.
rules_privacy_content_storage_security: Storage and Security: If data is never transmitted or stored server-side, it remains only on the user's device until the moment of sharing. No data is used for commercial, statistical, or advertising purposes.
rules_privacy_content_third_parties: Third Parties: No third party has access to the user's location data, unless the user chooses to share their location with emergency services or personal contacts.
rules_privacy_content_user_rights: User Rights: The user can stop any sharing at any time and revoke previously granted permissions. The user can also locally delete traces on their device.
rules_privacy_content_compliance: Compliance: The framework aligns with applicable privacy rules (e.g., GDPR for the EU, CCPA/CPRA for California, and local laws in the United States), and will be adapted according to the user's jurisdiction.
rules_privacy_content_modifications: Modifications: Any changes to these rules will be communicated in the app and on the official website.
